Class AiBoneWeight

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.jassimp.AiBoneWeight

  • public final class AiBoneWeight
extends java.lang.Object
    A single influence of a bone on a vertex.

      • getWeight

        public float getWeight()
        The strength of the influence in the range (0...1).
